data.name: Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook

A beautiful collection of concept art, 3D art and 2D art from the creators of Ancestors Legacy, shown in a Digital book of 50 pages.

Chapters:

Story: how we created the hand-drawn 2D animations for our single-player missions.
Characters: designing the compromise between historical accuracy and cool look of medieval warriors.
Environment: designing architecture and settlements to look cool and give players feeling of expansion, once they grow.
Team: the only full-team group photo we made during the development!
data.about_the_game:
Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook

A beautiful collection of concept art, 3D art and 2D art from the creators of Ancestors Legacy, shown in a Digital book of 50 pages.

Chapters:

Story: how we created the hand-drawn 2D animations for our single-player missions.
Characters: designing the compromise between historical accuracy and cool look of medieval warriors.
Environment: designing architecture and settlements to look cool and give players feeling of expansion, once they grow.
Team: the only full-team group photo we made during the development!
data.short_description: The digital version of Ancestors Legacy's Artbook. It showcases the game's selected art assets, as well as describes the art direction approach and production pipelines.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: PDF file only.
